channel.title: Help please trade glitch/bug
channel.description:
Hi everyone im trying to code a 508 i thought it was time to switch from 317 anyways there is this wierd problem with this server i am trying to code the trading screen works but when you trade with someone else your inventory turns into the other players inventory and you cant even put in items into the trade menu please help here is what keeps happening
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d9P6ZiOFLpQ&feature=youtu.be
i will pay you and make admin on the server if you help me out please! i do have skype too if that is easier for you to help skype name is : ryan7533573
